extensionDescription.message: A powerful clipboard extension for Chrome.

invalidImportFileFormat.description: Error message for invalid import file format

enterTagPrompt.description: Prompt text for entering a new tag

tagLimitAlert.message: You can only add up to 3 tags per item.

backToMainButtonTitle.description: Title for the back to main button

savedFormsTabTitle.description: Title for the saved forms tab

noFormMappingsMessage.description: Message displayed when no form mappings are found

deleteMappingButtonTitle.description: Title for the delete mapping button
